• Overview
  • Package
  • Type
Shadow Standard Library

shadow:io

Class Path

Parent class

shadow:standard@Object

immutable class Path

Class Path provides utilities for managing a path to a file in the operating system.

Create Summary

Modifiers Return Types Method and Description
public () create(String path)

Creates a Path object corresponding to the path specified by the given String.

Destroy Summary

Modifiers Return Types Method and Description
public () destroy()

Method Summary

Modifiers Return Types Method and Description
public readonly (Path) copy(AddressMap addresses)
public readonly (String) toString()

Returns a String representation of the path.

Property Summary

Modifiers Return Types Method and Description
public readonly native get locked (code) separator()

Gets the operating system-specific UTF-8 code point corresponding to the path separator, \ in Windows and / in Linux and Mac OS X.
